title: Old Photo of Woman Recruit in Somali Army Passed Off as Ilhan Omar
subtitle: Fact Check of Somali Army Recruit passed as Ilhan Omar Viral Photo: Old photo of a woman recruit of Somali Army is being shared on the social media with the claim that the woman in the photo is US Congresswoman Ilhan Omar. The claim is fake as the photo was taken four years before Omar was born.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
An old photo of a woman holding a gun in Somalia is being shared widely on social media with the claim that it is of Minnesota Democratic US Representative Ilhan Omar.

The photo is being shared on Twitter with the claim that Omar received training at an Al Qaeda camp in Somalia and that the Congresswoman is now trying to get the photo blocked from the internet.
